name: Wizard
description: A wizard presents a series of steps in  prescribed order. That the user needs to complete in order to accomplish a goal (e.g. purchase a product)
note: Use Wizard with nested Wizard.Step(s) to achieve the desired result.

props.name: activeConfig
props.description: The configuration of the active step (see Wizard.Step.propTypes)

props.name: onActiveIndexChanged
props.description: Callback that is called when the active step is changed (i.e. a step was clicked on). The new activeIndex will be the input of the callback

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Add or override style of the container
